grecaptcha
directive in module wo.grecaptcha

Description

Set view value of model when recaptcha validating is done.
Reset view value if recaptcha be expired.

Load greInfo with information about gre object.

Dependencies

  • $grecaptcha
  • $parse
  • $document

Usage

as attribute
<ANY grecaptcha
     [gre-info="{string}"]
     ng-model="{string}">
   ...
</ANY>

Directive info

  • This directive creates new scope.

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
gre-info
(optional)
string

Assignable angular expression to contain information about gre object

ng-modelstring

Assignable angular expression to data-bind to

Example

Source
